item.title: International Trade
item.description: Strange, Susan. “International Trade.” In Money and Trade (A Background Special), edited by Bertrand Jouvenel, Susan Strange, 53-77. London: Batchworth Press, 1955. Foregrounding the role of technology in the development of international trade, Strange discusses the difference between the theory of free trade and the actual patterns (and barriers) to international trade in the 1950s. This leads her to emphasise balance of payments problems linked to international monetary flows and political barriers to freer trade.
